Package org.sat4j.pb.constraints.pb

Implementations of pseudo boolean constraints. Caution: this is still an ongoing work. Use with care.
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IConflict  
    IConflictFactory  
    IDataStructurePB  
    IPostProcess
    Interface to post-process the assertive conflict, e.g. to convert it to a clause, to a cardinality.
    IRemoveSatisfiedLiterals  
    IWatchPb  
    IWeakeningStrategy
    Strategy used to reduce a PB constraint before applying the canceling addition operation.
    PBConstr

    AutoDivisionStrategy
